VyprNetworks - Providing affordable colocation, dedicated hosting and virtual server hosting out of Dallas, Texas. 

![](http://i.imgur.com/QdeMadl.png)

**Payment Methods - Paypal & Bitcoins**

**KVM Linux & Windows VPS**

- 256MB-4096MB RAM
- 5GB-50GB SSD 
- 1vCPU-4vCPU
- 100Mbit Unmetered Port
- Full Root Access
- 1 Dedicated Protected IPv4
- 1 IPv6 on Request
- Proxmox Control Panel
- Base Configuration 256MB-5GBSSD-100Mbit Port-1vCPU [$3.00/Per Month](https://vyprnetworks.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=17&carttpl=pure_comparison)
